name: Bug Eyes
overview: Bug Eyes is a video game published in 1985 by Icon. You play Agent Starman, your job is to avoid the destruction of civilization and taking over the galaxy by the bug-eyed Xabanneus alien hordes. Penetrate the ten levels of the Mother ship and destroy the power generator. You carry on your back an oxygen supply (represented by the energy bar on top) and an alien repulsion mechanism that will sometimes activate in times of danger.
